# MTLRasterizationRateSampleArray

**Class**

An array instance that contains rasterization rates.

## Declaration

```swift
class MTLRasterizationRateSampleArray
```

## Overview

The [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLRasterizationRateLayerDescriptor/horizontal] and [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLRasterizationRateLayerDescriptor/vertical] properties of an [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLRasterizationRateLayerDescriptor] point to [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLRasterizationRateSampleArray] instances that contains rasterization rates for the layer map. You can use array subscript syntax to access the samples. [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLRasterizationRateSampleArray] instances perform bounds checking on any memory operations you make to their sample data.

## Accessing the array

- **subscript(_:)**: Retrieves the sample value at the specified index.

## Inspecting the layer rate function parameters

- **sampleCount**: The number of rows and columns in the layer map.
- **maxSampleCount**: The maximum number of rows and columns in the layer map.
- **horizontal**: The horizontal rasterization rates for the layer map’s rows.
- **vertical**: The vertical rasterization rates for the layer map’s rows.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
